description:
A small and irregular table, perfectly formed for informal meetings,
particularly with coffee. Options to add castors for mobility, paper
dispenser for creativity and/or a pendant light for drama.

Like its big brother [Meeting][], Café slots together in seconds and can be
taken apart and flattened for easy transport. It's ideal for two to three
people, although its shape allows up-to four or five to gather round
if need be.

The suggested minimum space for one Cafe table is around 10 square metres
(105 sqft) or 17.5 square metres (190 sqft) for two.

[Meeting]: /designs/meeting
name: Cafe
